item.title: emacs配置
item.description: evil 为emacs绑定vim键 git clone https://github.com/emacs-evil/evil ~/.emacs.d/evil 编辑~/.emacs (add-to-list 'load-path "~/.emacs.d/evil") (require 'evil) (evil-mode 1) siderbar
